member.name: T:FloodFill.Fill
member.summary: Allows to fill a selected area with 1 color. It is used to add "Fill bucket" functionality to the drawing program(similiar to "Fill bucket" tool in MS Paint).

member.name: M:FloodFill.Fill.FillRegion(System.Drawing.Bitmap,System.Windows.Forms.PictureBox,System.Drawing.Point,System.Drawing.Color,System.Drawing.Color)
member.summary: Fils the selected area with a color. The applied algorithm was taken from https://simpledevcode.wordpress.com/2015/12/29/flood-fill-algorithm-using-c-net/ where it is described in details.
member.param: Bitmap where the area to fill is present..
Initial point, i.e. where an user clicked.
Targeted color, i.e. the color that is to be replaced by other one.
